name: Vercel Webhook Minimal
description: Vercel Edge Runtime で Webhook 受信。

files.template:
export const config = { runtime: 'edge' };
export default async function handler(req: Request) { const body = await req.text(); return new Response(JSON.stringify({ ok: true, len: body.length }), { headers: { 'content-type': 'application/json' } }); }
